code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient describes mild cough and moderate breathlessness during exercise. patient is a male flutist aged 36 years. o:Height 70 in, Weight 158 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17, nose = no nasal congestion, NAD, normocephalic/atraumatic (nc/at), Pulm: mild LLL wheeze o/w cta-b, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, HEENT: WNL, CTA-LL, wheeze-LU, PERRL, A&O x 3, wheeze-BIL, Chest: RRR, No M/G/R a:Asthma p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Albuterol ("rescue inhaler") - 2.5 mg as needed for SOB, and ordered FEV1, FEV1/VFC, PEF, Pulse Oximetry.
